metadata.name: Renamed Whoami Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of whoami that has been renamed to a different name to avoid detection

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('whoami.exe') AND NOT endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\whoami.exe')))

output.summary: Detects the execution of whoami that has been renamed to a different name to avoid detection
